channel.title: Who else has the same chair as Paddy?
channel.description:
His chair:
[img]https://img32.imageshack.us/img32/204/dsc01357kjo.jpg[/img]
My chair:
[img]https://img405.imageshack.us/img405/2180/image0015.jpg[/img]
But mine is broken. :frowning:
[img]https://img259.imageshack.us/img259/1064/image0016s.jpg[/img]
Half a dozen others have claimed to have identical chairs too, but I want to see pics, or I don't believe you. :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: Who else has the same chair as Paddy?
item.dc:creator: awsgames
item.description:
The Minotaur:

How did you manage to ‘accidently’ leave it outside. :fffuuu:

I was playing checkers with one of my friends and enjoying the warm weather, but we forgot about it when we went back in and didn’t remember it 'till morning. But by then, it was too late.

Read full topic

item.title: Who else has the same chair as Paddy?
